definition: to patrol/to make one's rounds/classifier for rounds of drinks
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
(theater etc) to tour/to be on tour/to give itinerant performances

pinyin: xun2 hui2 fen1 xi1 duan1 kou3

sentences.english: This week, he was resoundingly upheld by the Ninth Circuit.
sentences.chinese: 这星期，他的意见轰动性的被第九巡回法院赞成了。

sentences.english: John's about to start a nine-week national speaking tour.
sentences.chinese: 约翰即将展开一场历时九周的全国巡回演讲。
我喜欢这些巴士巡回之旅。

sentences.english: At present, they are visiting all parts of the country. They will be arriving here tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 目前他们正在全国各地巡回上演，今天就要抵达此地。

sentences.english: The album was compiled from live recordings from last year's tour.
sentences.chinese: 这套唱片选辑由去年巡回演出的实况录音汇编而成。

sentences.english: And the Antiques Roadshow has paid dividends to small dealers as well.
sentences.chinese: 和古董巡回秀已给小的经销商带来好处。
上层建筑保持防火巡回检查。

sentences.english: The preacher was circuiting about the state.
sentences.chinese: 这位布道者正在该州巡回布道。

sentences.english: Take time with the family and prepare for the next tournament.
sentences.chinese: 与家人度过这段时光和为下一个巡回赛做准备。

sentences.english: In this manner, they stroll through the city making music, serenading locals and tourists alike.
sentences.chinese: 他们以这种方式巡回全市，奏乐以飨当地居民和游客。

sentences.english: In two thousand, the LPGA celebrated its fiftieth anniversary.
sentences.chinese: LPGA巡回赛的两千年，庆祝其成立五十周年。

sentences.english: How to get the information of China Queer Film Festival Tour?
sentences.chinese: 如何获得中国酷儿影像巡回展的展映讯息？

sentences.english: In the same year an itinerant black preacher arrived in Los Angeles.
sentences.chinese: 就在同一年，一个黑人巡回传教士抵达了洛杉矶。

sentences.english: The suit was filed in Illinois' Circuit Court of Cook County.
sentences.chinese: 诉讼是向库克县伊利诺斯巡回法院递交的。

sentences.english: The Negro minstrel is touring the country.
sentences.chinese: 那个黑人歌舞团正在全国各地巡回演出。

sentences.english: Thank you for joining us at the "EXPO NOW" Photo Exhibition here in Liverpool.
sentences.chinese: 感谢大家光临上海世博会图片英国巡回展利物浦站。

definition: (theater etc) to tour/to be on tour/to give itinerant performances/abbr. for 巡迴演出|巡回演出[xun2 hui2 yan3 chu1]
(theater etc) to tour/to be on tour/to give itinerant performances
to make a pilgrimage (to visit a holy site)/to go on a sightseeing tour
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
to perform (e.g. on the stage)/to lecture
first organized/to run sth for the first time
